text: Beryl Wayne Sprinkel (November 20, 1923 â€“ August 22, 2009) was a member of the Executive Office of the US President and chairman of the Council of Economic Advisors (CEA) between April 4, 1985 and January 21, 1989, during the Reagan administration. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Chicago Category:American economists Category:United States Council of Economic Advisers Category:Scientists from Chicago Category:Businesspeople from Chicago
